title: Experimental determination of the partitioning of representative organic pollutants to the air–water interface
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,510-518
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00394A, Paper

Emma M. McLay, Carole Abdel Nour, Yao Yan Huang, Zoë M. Golay, Pascal Wong-Wah-Chung, Stéphanie Rossignol, D. James Donaldson
Glancing-angle laser-induced fluorescence is used to obtain adsorption isotherms of organic pollutants at the air–water interface.
